DOC.brief_summary: The medical literature provide sufficient information recommendation regard optimal time remove staple bandage cesarean section . The goal study compare 5 group patient : 1. staple removal POD 4 dress removal Post Operative Day ( POD ) 1 2. staple removal POD 4 dress removal Post Operative Day ( POD ) 4 3. staple removal POD 7 dress removal Post Operative Day ( POD ) 1 4. staple removal POD 7 dress removal Post Operative Day ( POD ) 7 5. staple removal POD 4 dress removal Post Operative Day ( POD ) 7 Since definite protocol staple dress removal , adapt protocol 3-4 month period time . Patients contact either return follow visit answer telephone survey .
